content.prompt: Which of the following statements about the role and function of executives in each country is most accurate?

choices.label: The British monarch and the Iranian supreme leader are both largely ceremonial positions.
The Nigerian president conducts foreign policy, whereas the Russian president relies on the prime minister for foreign policy.
Iran has a supreme leader instead of a president, whereas Russia has a president and a prime minister who serve as equals.
The Chinese president and the Nigerian president are both commanders in chief of the armed forces.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
